description:
This task aims at creating beautiful abstract wallpapers for the Mifos Initiative. Please make sure that the content is original, creative and fresh. Suggested dimensions for wallpaper;
Full screen : 1024 X 768
Widescreen : 1920 X 1080 ( Desktop wallpaper )
Mobile phone : 1080 X 1920
If you're using any third party images, please make sure they fall under the Creative Commons License. Any assets ( images, drawings, photos ) which are licensed under Creative Commons, must have proper Attribution. Share the document you've written in https://goo.gl/sGZKpt with the task mentor. Also, append your name to the submitted file so that we know who did the work.
name: Create Wallpapers For The Mifos Initiative
